entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with snow near midnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
